activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7686
coronasafe/care_fe#7646
activity.text:
we have got this feedback from Doctors in Hubli HUB and Bangalore HUB.

Another issue is, we have noticed 

1. Nurses also using this chat box, to reply to doctors notes. 
2. We have noticed Spoke doctors also using this to put notes to their patients.
3. we have noticed doctors use it as a chat interface, instead of just Orders. 

Why this is an issue ?

- On the patient page - there is not quick reference for Doctor's orders. 
- On the dashboard, each conversation is considered as a TeleICU consultation. - this is inflating the number of TeleICU consultations . Hence there needs to be a clear demarcation as which is the doctors notes (TeleICU doctor notes) and which are Doctor orders (spoke hospital doctors putting orders and rounds details for their patients) and which are Nurses replies / notes in that chat interface.

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7510
activity.text: @gigincg yes the purpose it to filter the users by Home facility. so if that is deployed, then that should be good.

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7511
activity.text: @rithviknishad We understood, that the issue is observed when the presets are deleted. but we do not know who deleted the presets. can we restrict the delete option, and keep only edit preset option. ?

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7511
activity.text:
@rithviknishad 
- Bed is assigned to the patient
- Camera was configured to the patient (later we found that the presets were getting deleted) this is observed in many hospitals . So may be we should restrict who deletes the Camera Presets.
- The consultation was not ended. Patient is not yet discharged
- User : State Admin
